backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining hotel management system types (Hotel, UserProfile, DailyReport, Emergency, Task, etc.) and data structures with authentication/authorization mixins, default hotel initialization, and audit logging functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two authentication-related features: reverting login logic to Version 16 and fixing the 'user is already authenticated' error message, both targeting LoginPage.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files describing React components, pages, hooks, and utilities for the hotel management application including authentication, task management, reports, and admin functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light/dark themes, enhanced dialog overlays with backdrop blur, and utility classes ensuring interactive button styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Cluster LPM application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application setup with TanStack Router configuration, QueryClient provider, route definitions for admin and hotel user pages, and RequireAuth wrapper for role-based access control.
frontend/src/components/admin/CreateHote: Dialog component for creating new hotels with form validation, loading states, and integration with useCreateHotel mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/admin/CreateTask: Dialog component for creating tasks with title, description, priority, due date, and multi-hotel selection using checkboxes, with form validation and integration with useCreateTask mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/CreateUser: Dialog component for creating new users with form validation, including fields for principal, name, username, hotel assignment, contact info, password, and role selection (admin/user).
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteHote: Confirmation dialog for deleting hotels with warning that hotels with assigned users cannot be deleted.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteUser: Confirmation dialog for deleting users by principal ID with loading state during deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditHotelD: Dialog for editing hotel properties including name and active status with form validation and pre-population of existing data.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditUserDi: Dialog for updating user profiles with fields for name, username, hotel assignment, contact info, password, active status, and role with validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication wrapper component that enforces login requirements, checks user active status, validates admin role access, and displays appropriate loading/error states.
Main application layout shell with header, navigation sidebar (admin vs hotel user menus), user profile dropdown, logout functionality, and footer with social links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette for warm hospitality theme, including light/dark mode variants and enhanced dialog/button interaction styles.
frontend/src/lib/auth/useAuth.ts: Authentication hooks using React Query for fetching/saving user profiles, checking admin status, with error handling for unauthorized access and automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/lib/backend/admin.ts: React Query hooks for hotel management operations (CRUD) including getAllHotels, createHotel, updateHotel, and deleteHotel with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/backend/analytics.ts: Placeholder hook for analytics summary queries, currently disabled as backend implementation is not yet available.
frontend/src/lib/backend/audit.ts: React Query hook for fetching audit logs from the backend actor.
frontend/src/lib/backend/emergencies.ts: Placeholder hooks for emergency management (submission, recipients CRUD), currently disabled as backend implementation is not yet available.
frontend/src/lib/backend/hotels.ts: React Query hook for fetching all hotels from the backend, enabled when actor is available.
frontend/src/lib/backend/queries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching caller's user role and profile with single retry disabled and actor availability checks.
frontend/src/lib/backend/reports.ts: Placeholder hooks for daily report management (fetch my/all reports, save report), currently disabled as backend implementation is not yet available.
frontend/src/lib/backend/tasks.ts: React Query hooks for task management including fetching all tasks, user-specific tasks, creating tasks, and managing task comments with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/backend/users.ts: React Query hooks for user management operations including fetching all user profiles, creating users, and updating users with comprehensive error handling and logging.
frontend/src/lib/export/csv.ts: Utility function to export array data to CSV format with proper escaping and automatic download trigger.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider context for the entire app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Analytics dashboard page displaying placeholder metrics for reports, emergencies, and tasks with a notice that backend functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAuditLogsP: Displays a filterable table of system audit logs with action type and hotel filters. Shows timestamp, principal, action, hotel name, and details for each log entry.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard landing page with quick action cards for navigating to analytics, reports, emergency log, tasks, hotels, users, emergency recipients, and audit logs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEmergencyL: Displays a filterable table of emergency alerts across all hotels, showing timestamp, hotel, severity, location, description, and reporter information.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEmergencyR: Manages SMS notification contacts for emergency alerts with add/remove functionality and a table displaying current recipients.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHotelsPage: Manages hotel properties with a table showing ID, name, and status, plus dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting hotels.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminReportsDas: Displays daily operational reports with hotel filtering and CSV export functionality, though shows an alert that backend implementation is pending.
Admin page for viewing all tasks across hotels with a table displaying task details (title, priority, status, due date, assigned hotels/users) and a button to create new tasks via CreateTaskDialog.
Admin page for managing user accounts, displaying a table of all users with their profiles (name, username, role, hotel, contact, status) and action buttons to create, edit, or delete users.
frontend/src/pages/hotel/DailyReportForm: Form page for hotel staff to submit daily operational reports with numeric fields for occupancy, VIP arrivals, incidents, complaints, and injuries, which are saved to the backend upon submission.
frontend/src/pages/hotel/EmergencyTrigge: Emergency alert submission page allowing hotel staff to report urgent situations by selecting a category, severity level, and providing details, which triggers immediate notifications.
frontend/src/pages/hotel/HotelDashboardP: Main dashboard for hotel staff displaying quick action cards for submitting daily reports, viewing reports, triggering emergency alerts, and managing tasks.
frontend/src/pages/hotel/MyDailyReportsP: Page displaying a table of all daily reports submitted by the current user, showing operational metrics (occupancy, incidents, complaints, injuries) with timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/hotel/MyTasksPage.tsx: React component that displays a user's assigned tasks in a table format with loading states, status badges, priority indicators, and formatted due dates using the useGetMyTasks hook.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component handling Internet Identity authentication with timeout management, multi-stage login flow, and automatic redirection to admin after successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Profile setup page for new users to enter their name and username after authentication, with error handling for authorization issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including HSL-based color variables, custom shadows, animations, and typography plugin integration for the frontend application.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking known authentication issues (broken login in v17, 'already authenticated' error in v16) and feature requests to revert and fix login functionality.
